ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Trueshot Chainmail Ranger Quest armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure if anyone answered yet bc my computer had a snafu followed by a hurricane taking power out... The golden bandit tooth drops off of the wood-elf
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure if anyone answered yet bc my computer had a snafu followed by a
hurricane taking power out...
The golden bandit tooth drops off of the wood-elf bandits near kelethin in
greater faydark.
luv,
-Su

>
> I believe this drops in BB there is a wandering Ogre "bandit" not sure
what his actual title is around the fork inthe road leading to Gfay. He has
dropped the tooth every time I killed him. Greyvin (31 druid)
> P.S. He aggros all the time on me
> - 1 golden bandit tooth (note: not sure where to obtain this or what it
drops from, but I suspect the bandits in NK probably)
>
>

> Do you Yahoo!?
> New DSL Internet Access from SBC & Yahoo!
